content:
My earning potential is 293kNZD. I still feel like we are struggling. Probably because we don't see the money. Most of it goes straight on the mortgage and we try to spend less. I'm very aware we are killing it and our lifestyle is high but it doesn't feel luxurious given the amounts. 
Next topic, dinner. The kids have taken to making their own dinners. It bothers me. But I guess it's my own fault. I should be making toast and noodles or something they will actually eat, instead of doing a roast pork with roast veges and home made apple sauce.
